about_the_game:
Latest comments from developers

At present, the standard version of the game has been successfully produced. The next update will feature the hidden true ending HE of the game. If this game gains more support from players in the future, I will ignite new motivation to complete all the hidden content of this game!

Let's look forward to it together!

What type of game is this?

This is an experimental multi storyline game.

The work tells the story of a deceased young man named Li Yupeng, whose consciousness is forcibly implanted into a world that does not belong to him. He will find all the truth and end his reincarnation.

The work consists of a mixture of 24storylines, 3 types of reincarnation endings, and 1 main ending.

Your experience before and after the game was launched

Before the official launch of Steam, this game was launched as a mobile game on the third floor of Hulu Man, a 4399 game box, and a fast-paced mobile game platform. After a month of testing with over a hundred people and providing encouragement and recognition, 20% of players in the game have completed all levels and achieved full success. There is a certain threshold for getting started, and it needs to combine puzzle solving content with chase warfare. Please believe that you can pass it yourself, and I also believe that this game I have created with my heart, Players who are truly interested in the game, even if the difficulty is high, will seriously experience this work. However, players who cannot accept the game, even if I set the difficulty to zero, will still hastily withdraw and give me a negative review of the game. Thank you again for letting me understand this truth!

What do you want to say to players who are experiencing this type of game for the first time?

All of your operational results are part of the game experience, including repeating death until you find the truth of the world. Therefore, please do not be discouraged by death, nor do you feel that the game experience is over just by getting through the reincarnation ending. Because reopening the game is also part of the game content experience, some things will change, and the main difficulty of the game is chasing battles and reasoning the plot, Don't miss the reminders and hints of each dialog box, and have fun!

What should I do after experiencing this game?

The game was initiated three years ago and currently requires a total development time of 500 hours. Currently, we are independently producing and have included the game for free. Based on feedback from everyone, we have been refining and adjusting it for a year and transitioning to a paid model. If you feel that there is still room for improvement in the game experience, then you are welcome to support us. Your support for our game is the driving force behind our development and updates, so that we can have the energy and time to do better and go further.

What does the author want to express to the player?

Finally, on behalf of ZSJ's personal studio, I would like to guarantee that "Midnight Reincarnation in Muxi Town" is always based on game storytelling as the core standard. We will listen to useful opinions to make the game better, but we will never completely change the core content to cater to the general audience. Please rest assured to experience it, and I will defend the soul of this game to the death!

JJY works, Thank you for experiencing our game
